item.title: Karnataka: 40-Year-Old Man Dies After Falling Into Fire Pit During Muharram Ritual In Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Karnataka: 40-Year-Old Man Dies After Falling Into Fire Pit During Muharram Ritual In Raichur |
A 40-year-old man succumbed to burn injuries after falling into a fire pit on Saturday during Muharram celebrations in Karnataka's Raichur district. The man was immediately taken to hospital but could not be saved.

item.author: Vinay Mishra
